text: François Delapierre (4 November 1970 - 20 June 2015) was a French politician. He served as the national secretary of the Left Party from December 2010 until his death. He was also the regional councillor of Île-de-France from February 2009 until his death. He was also a member of the Socialist Party from 1986 to 2008. He was born in Paris. Delapierre died from brain cancer on 20 June 2015 in Paris, aged 44. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Politicians from Paris
title: François Delapierre
